content: In terms of its impact on the 2022 financial results, we anticipate that the Atlanta campus will incur approximately $600,000 of expense related to rent and other startup costs during the second half of the year, with the majority recognized in the fourth quarter. And also, our updated - and so, our updated 2022 guidance is, revenue between $340 million and $350 million, adjusted EBITDA between $25 million and $30 million, net income ranging from $10 million to 15 million, flat students starts in the range of minus 3%, deposit of 3%, and lastly, capital expenditures of between $8 million to $11 million.
